message.voicechat.saved_debug_report: Saved voice chat debug report to %s
message.voicechat.saved_debug_report_fai: Failed to save voice chat debug report: %s
message.voicechat.group_type.normal.desc: Players that are not in your group can't hear you, but you can hear them
message.voicechat.group_type.open.descri: Players that are not in your group can hear you and you can hear them
message.voicechat.group_type.isolated.de: Players that are not in your group can't hear you and you can't hear them
message.voicechat.server_port: Voice chat server hosted on port %s
message.voicechat.macos_no_mic_permissio: No microphone permission. Please check Security & Privacy settings
message.voicechat.macos_unsupported_laun: Your launcher does not support MacOS microphone permissions
message.voicechat.mute.disabled_ptt: You can't mute when using push to talk
message.voicechat.disable.enabled: Press to enable all voice chat sounds
message.voicechat.disable.disabled: Press to disable all voice chat sounds

message.voicechat.hide_icons.disabled: Press to hide all voice chat icons

message.voicechat.onboarding.introductio:
This setup guide helps you to configure your voice chat.

If you know what you are doing, you can skip this.
I know what I'm doing - Skip
message.voicechat.onboarding.skip.title: Skip Setup
message.voicechat.onboarding.skip.descri:
Do you really want to skip the setup guide?

If you skip the setup you have to adjust all settings manually!
message.voicechat.onboarding.speaker: Select a Speaker
message.voicechat.onboarding.activation: Please choose a method to activate your Microphone.
When selecting %s you need to press and hold a button to talk.
%s will automatically activate your microphone once a certain volume threshold is reached.
message.voicechat.onboarding.ptt.title: Choose a Push to Talk Keybind
message.voicechat.onboarding.ptt.descrip: Please select the key that should be used to activate your microphone.
message.voicechat.onboarding.voice.title: Adjust Microphone Activation Threshold
message.voicechat.onboarding.voice.descr: Enable microphone testing and make sure the volume is below the slider when you're silent and above it when you are speaking.
message.voicechat.onboarding.final.descr:
You have successfully configured your voice chat!

Open the voice chat menu with %s.
Hold %s while talking to use the voice chat.
You will be muted when exiting this screen. Press %s to unmute.

You can always change all settings in the voice chat menu.
Keybinds can be changed like any other keybind in the game.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.recording_:
The location where recordings should be saved
Leave empty for default location
cloth_config.voicechat.config.run_local_: If voice chat should work in singleplayer/LAN worlds
cloth_config.voicechat.config.offline_pl: If the volume adjustment GUI should also show offline players
cloth_config.voicechat.config.freecam_mo:
How listening to other players should work when using freecam mods
CAMERA: You will hear voice chat audio around your camera. Whether you hear distant audio depends on the voice chat broadcast range of the server
PLAYER: You will hear voice chat audio around your player no matter where your camera is
cloth_config.voicechat.config.mute_on_jo: If enabled, you will be automatically muted when joining a world
cloth_config.voicechat.config.audio_pack:
The maximum amount of audio packets that are held back if a packet arrives out of order or gets dropped
This prevents discarding audio packets that are slightly out of order
Set this to 0 to disable
cloth_config.voicechat.config.voice_deac:
The time it takes for the microphone to deactivate when using voice activation
A value of 1 means 20 milliseconds, 2=40 ms, 3=60 ms, ...
cloth_config.voicechat.config.output_buf:
The size of the audio output buffer in packets
Higher values mean a higher latency, but less crackles
Increase this value if you have an unstable internet connection
cloth_config.voicechat.config.hud_icon_s: The scale of the HUD icons
cloth_config.voicechat.config.hud_icon_p:
The X position of the HUD icons
Negative values mean anchoring to the right

The Y position of the HUD icons
Negative values mean anchoring to the bottom
cloth_config.voicechat.config.group_play: The orientation of the player icons in the group HUD
cloth_config.voicechat.config.group_hud_: The scale of the group HUD
cloth_config.voicechat.config.group_play:
The X position of the player icons in the group HUD
Negative values mean anchoring to the right

The Y position of the player icons in the group HUD
Negative values mean anchoring to the bottom
cloth_config.voicechat.config.show_own_g: If the own icon should be shown when in a group
